name: Spicy Zombies!
description:
This is my entry for the Trijam #153 game jam, this is a game jam where you have 3 hours only to create a complete game. The theme of this jam was Empty World.

Be sure to click on full screen for best experience.

In this empty world that has been over run by Zombies! you are the last human remaining. 

You discovered that the Zombies have a weakness to hot sauce and you can exploit this.

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move, collect hot sauce and press SPACE to use it when Zombies are close to destroy them. Survive as long as possible!

I live streamed the entire creation of this game on Youtube for anyone that would like to check it out you can see the replay here.
